main

Class Thymio

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Thymio

  • public class Thymio
extends java.lang.Object

    Thymio Class for Course Informationssysteme (SS 2016) Universitaet Regensburg

    Dozent: Prof. Dr. Bernd Ludwig
    Mitarbeiter: Aigner Johannes, Thiemo Kersting
    For more Information contact one of these.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aigner Johannes: johannes.aigner@stud.uni-regensburg.de

      static int MAX_SPEED
      Maximum Speed Thymio can drive!

      Thymio(java.lang.String ip)
      Generates "new" Thymio with given IP Inits Thymio Connection Throws Exception if your IP isn't available or your Raspberry isn't running!

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_SPEED

        public static final int MAX_SPEED
        Maximum Speed Thymio can drive!
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Thymio

        public Thymio(java.lang.String ip)
        Generates "new" Thymio with given IP Inits Thymio Connection Throws Exception if your IP isn't available or your Raspberry isn't running! You have to init Thymio first of all before running any commands!
        Parameters:
        ip: - The IP of your Raspberry

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        public void drive(int motorLeft,
                  int motorRight)
        Method for driving Thymio with given Speed (Left and Right)
        Parameters:
        motorLeft: - Speed for Motor Left (-500 - +500)
        motorRight: - Speed for Motor Right (-500 - + 500)

      • getGroundReflected

        public double[] getGroundReflected()
        Method for getting the Sensor-Data from the Ground Sensors

      • getProxHorizontal

        public double[] getProxHorizontal()
        Method for getting the Sensor-Data from the Horizontal Sensors

      • move

        public void move()
        Method for driving to next Field Thymio will drive one field and will probably correct itself. This Method tries to move exactly one field (straight!)

      • onField

        public int onField()
        Method for getting the current field Color from Thymio

      • rotate

        public void rotate(double degree)
        Method for rotating Thymio with given degrees
        Parameters:
        degree: - Degrees for Rotation (-360 - +360)

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Method for stopping Thymio. This Method stops the Thymio by setting speed to zero!
